text: Wild Desire (Turkish: Vahşi Arzu) is a 1953 Turkish drama film directed by Enver Burçkin and starring Ayhan Işık, Mesiha Yelda and Ahmet Tarik Tekçe.İnanoğlu ==Cast== * Ayhan Işık * Mesiha Yelda * Ahmet Tarik Tekçe * Zeki Alpan ==References== ==Bibliography== * Türker İnanoğlu. 5555 afişle Türk Sineması. Kabalcı, 2004. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 drama films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish drama films
title: Wild Desire
